article: Are you interested in birds? Do you want to learn about _ ? Go birdwatching. Birdwatching is a great _ . How to start it? Buy a bird book at first. It can _ much useful information about birds for you. _ you can buy a pair of binoculars and a notebook. You can watch birds in _ or some nature reserves. Many reserves are _ and have many facilities   for children and the family. Children will feel _ and can spend fun days there. _ is usually the best time to go birdwatching. Most birds sing songs and fly _ before 10:30 am, _ a few birds like to fly and hunt at night, such as the owl  . Whenever you watch them, don't make loud noise to _ them. Remember to take notes _ the sizes of the birds and colours of their feathers when you find them. Write down the _ time of the day and the year. Also write down _ you saw the birds. In a park or in a nature reserve? And you can look up the birds in your bird book to learn more about them.
